application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Single storey rear extension (following the demolition of the existing sheds)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 21-047-E01 Existing OS Plan, 21-047-E02 Existing Ground Floor Plan, 21-047-E03 Existing Front First Floor Plan, 21-047-E04 Existing Loft Plan, 21-047-E05 Existing Roof Plan, 21-047-E06 Existing Front Elevation (North-West Facing), 21-047-E07 Existing Rear Elevation (South-East Facing), 21-047-E08 Existing Side Elevation (North-East Facing), 21-047-E09 Existing Section A-A, 21-047-P01 Proposed OS Plan, 21-047-P02 Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 21-047-P03 Proposed First Floor Plan (As Existing), 21-047-P04 Proposed Loft Plan (As Existing), 21-047-P05 Proposed Roof Plan (As Existing), 21-047-P06 Proposed Front Elevation (North-West Facing) (As Existing), 21-047-P07 Proposed Rear Elevation (South-East Facing), 21-047-P08 Proposed Side Elevation (North-East Facing), 21-047-P09 Proposed Section A-A, Design and Access Statement by red and white dated August 2021
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless specified on the application form.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
